description: Demolish existing structures. Erection of a 12 storey building comprising of commercial floorspace (Use Class E) at ground floor and 58 no. flats with associated landscaping, balconies, cycle storage, waste / refuse space, play areas and amenity space. (Summary).
decision_conditions:
The development hereby permitted shall be begun no later than the  expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the requirements of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
